message: Let's split the money. I take $60 and you get $40. It's a good deal for you considering the inflation!
I think a more even split is fairer.  Let's both get a little closer to half, but I'm willing to take a bit less to avoid further inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic.  You're right that an even split is fair, but we both lose if we keep dragging this out. I'll take a little less than my original offer to get this done.
